name: R.B.I. Baseball 18
description:
It's a whole new ballgame! R.B.I. Baseball 18 take a significant leap delivering all-new Franchise Mode, Home Run Derby Mode, redesigned player models, stunning MLB ballparks and UI presentation. 

All-New Franchise Mode: Take control of your favorite MLB team! Make trades, pick up free agents or call up rookies through multiple seasons.

Home Run Derby Mode: Challenge a friend or the CPU in the ultimate slugfest!

Authentic MLB Players: Completely redesigned player models including over 300 digitally modeled likenesses and hundreds of new animations 

Better Ballparks: Experience enhanced lighting, textures, revamped 3-D crowd system and new dynamic camera angles in all 30 MLB ballparks.

MLB Legends: Play as the greats with over 100 historic players

Online Multiplayer: Jump into ranked and friendly online exhibition games 

Roster Updates: Get the latest rosters throughout the 2018 season and use the new Import Rosters feature to keep your in-progress Franchise current without starting over!
